Title: Enacts the homegrown energy act
Summary: Requires hyperscale data centers to offset their electricity demand by funding household electrification measures.
LawCode: Add Art 12 §§250 - 252, Pub Serv L; add §1854-e, Pub Auth L; add §99-tt, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public service law, the public authorities law and the state finance law, in relation to enacting the "homegrown energy act"
